mapper.select: INSERT INTO board_gallery (num, writer, caption, imagePath, regdate ) VALUES(board_gallery_seq.NEXTVAL, #{writer}, #{caption}, #{imagePath}, SYSDATE)

SELECT result1.* FROM (SELECT num,writer,caption,imagePath,TO_CHAR(regdate, 'YY.MM.DD HH24:MI') AS regdate, LAG(num, 1, 0) OVER (ORDER BY num DESC) nextNum, LEAD(num, 1, 0) OVER (ORDER BY num DESC) prevNum FROM board_gallery) result1 WHERE num=#{num}
